title: Excel Dashboard
description: Created an interactive Excel-based performance dashboard, utilizing advanced formulas, conditional formatting, and data visualization techniques to track and evaluate business performance, resulting in improved data analysis and insights.

title: RSVP Dashboard
description: RSVP Movies: Analyzed 2019-2021 data using Power BI, identifying top 3 genres driving 40% revenue, optimizing marketing for 25% international market share growth, and revealing 30% budget-success correlation, enhancing data-driven decisions by 90%. Cleaned dataset in Excel.

title: Adidas Dashboard
description: Adidas US Sales Analysis: Utilized Power BI to uncover sales trends, operational efficiency, and profitability across regions, products, and retailers. Cleaned dataset in Excel. Identified top-performing areas, seasonal trends, and growth opportunities to optimize sales strategy.

title: E-commerce using SQL
description: Ecommerce Customer Analysis: Utilized SQL Workbench to query, analyze, and visualize customer data, demonstrating expertise in SQL, data modeling, and analytical problem-solving to inform business growth strategies.

title: Python Project
description: CardioGoodFitness Customer Profiling: Analyzed demographic and behavioural data in Jupyter Notebook to identify patterns. Uncovered key customer segments, usage patterns, fitness correlations, and income-driven purchasing decisions, informing targeted marketing strategies for a 25% customer acquisition boost and a 15% retention increase.
